alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:04PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Essex, northern Worcester and northern Middlesex Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 103 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gardner, or 10 miles west of Fitchburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, Heavy Rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Heavy rain may cause ponding on roads. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Waltham, Methuen, Leominster, Fitchburg, Billerica, Woburn, Chelmsford, Andover, Lexington, Dracut, Tewksbury, Belmont, Burlington, Wilmington, Westford, Acton, Gardner, Concord and Sudbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex
